etransclem2.dvnf $e |- ( ( ph /\ i e. ( 0 ... ( R + 1 ) ) ) -> ( ( RR Dn F ) ` i ) : RR --> CC ) $.
etransclem2.g $e |- G = ( x e. RR |-> sum_ i e. ( 0 ... R ) ( ( ( RR Dn F ) ` i ) ` x ) ) $.
etransclem2 $p |- ( ph -> ( RR _D G ) = ( x e. RR |-> sum_ i e. ( 0 ... R ) ( ( ( RR Dn F ) ` ( i + 1 ) ) ` x ) ) ) $.
